name: sb-xero-attach-master-actor
title: SB Xero Attach Master Actor
description: Downloads yearly Xero attachment CSVs from Dropbox temp links, merges and classifies them into a master attachment map.
seoDescription: Builds a master Xero attachment map from Dropbox-hosted CSV exports.

schema.title: SB Xero Master Handoff
schema.description: Year + three Dropbox TempLinks JSON blob from Make.com.
